title: When did tools appear? In what species? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s a nice article: Stone Tools Note that since several species of proto-humans existed at the same time, it’s difficult to say which made what. Also, note that these are the earliest stone tools. It’s likely that various tools made of substances (like wood or bone) would precede them, but not be preserved through the ages.
When did tools appear? About 2 million years ago. In what species? Pan-Homos. What kind of tools were made? Stone flaking, spears and blankets made of leaves.
